did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Jung, David C. Papers,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

did.abstract: Market reports, investment evaluations, management studies, etc. made by Quantum Science Corporation. 16 mm sound film, I.M. CLONE, which describes a day in the life of a business executive in the year 2000.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of David C. Jung, 1986, 1987, and 1988.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: David C. Jung Papers. M0844. Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: David C. Jung served as Staff Vice President, ISG Market Development for the McDonnell Douglas Information Systems Group.

scopecontent.head: Collection Scope and Content Summary
scopecontent.p: Market reports, investment evaluations, management studies, etc. made by Quantum Science Corporation. 16 mm sound film, I.M. CLONE, which describes a day in the life of a business executive in the year 2000.

controlaccess.head: Access Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Computer engineering.
Microelectronics industry--California--Santa Clara County.

did.unittitle: Quantum Science. Minicoputers and Microcomputers (The Squeeze is on) 1974

scopecontent.p: Very important early study detailing what impact micros would have on minis and Silicon Valley firms.

did.unittitle: Quantum Science. MAPTEK - Computer Services Forecast Part I1969

scopecontent.p: Purchased by 30 leading computer firms to support market and product decisions (IBM, Burroughs, etc.). Describes impact on Silicon Valley firms.

did.unittitle: Quantum Science. MAPTEK - Computer Services (Domestic) Forecast Part II1969
Quantum Science. MAPTEK - Computer Services (Domestic) Forecast Part III1969
Quantum Science. MAPTEK - Computer Services Strategy Program, Vol. I. Management Action Report1973
Quantum Science. MAPTEK Report - Computer Services Strategy Program (Vol. II) Strategies1973
Quantum Science. MAPTEK Report - Computer Services Program / 73 Vol. III / Data Base1973
Quantum Science. MAPTEK Strategy Report - Management Action in Technology - Computer Equipment Strategy Program1974
Quantum Science. MAPTEK Computing Equipment Strategy Program 1974-1979, Vol. III / Data Base1974
Quantum Science. MAPTEK - Strategy for Entering Time-Sharing, Part I1970

scopecontent.p: The pioneering study for this now industry. Discusses Silicon Valley Ffrms.

did.unittitle: Quantum Science. MAPTEK - Strategy for Entering Time-Sharing, Part II1970
Quantum Science. MAPTEK - Logicon 2x21970

scopecontent.p: Study helped NYSE firm to decide whether to get into the computer business.

did.unittitle: Quantum Science. MAPTEK Computer Equipment Strategy Program, Vol. I Management Action Report1973

scopecontent.p: Purchased by 35 leading computer firms to help plan equipment and technology directions. Discusses Silicon Valley firms.

scopecontent.p: The fundamental study of AMDAHL which resulted in the Japanese making a major investment.

did.unittitle: Quantum Science. AMDAHL1974

scopecontent.p: Used by Japanese to justify entering into the U.S. semiconductor market. Discusses Silicon Valley firms.

did.unittitle: Quantum Science. IBM SB Computer1974

scopecontent.p: Market review of IBM's early small business computer program.

did.unittitle: Quantum Science. Dirk's Investment Analysis1972

scopecontent.p: Study performed of Dirks computer to support venture corporate investment by Hale. A Silicon Valley firm.

did.unittitle: Quantum Science. McAuto TSO1974

scopecontent.p: Study of McAuto's Time-Sharing Services.

scopecontent.p: Important early study of computer-aided manufacturing products and market needs.

did.unittitle: Quantum Science. Automated Information Storage and Retrieval1973

scopecontent.p: Discusses Silicon Valley firms.

scopecontent.p: Discusses Silicon Valley firms.

did.unittitle: Quantum Science. Mass Storage Custom Study1973

scopecontent.p: Done for Control Data. Evaluates several Silicon Valley firms.
